description: For Connor Maguire, Josh Villa and Drake Tyler, this guys-only retreat into the wine country is not just a weekend get-away for the boys, but a chance for these old college roomies to catch up on some unfinished business. As they enjoy a complimentary bottle of the area's finest, they begin to reminisce about the old days, and Connor lets it slip that Drake gave him the best blow job of his life back in the day. Maybe it's just the atmosphere taking hold, or maybe the years have increased Drake's lust, but at the first chance, he's back on his knees and taking Connor's cock deep into his mouth, just like back in the dorms. Josh sips from his glass, staring hard and trying to remain coy, but Drake abolishes all pretense and invites him to join. Seconds later the three of them are getting absolutely fucking filthy in the kitchen.Connor fucks Drake on the counter-top while Josh is sucking off Drake. Connor let's out a barbaric howl as he continues to pound away, and then Josh and Connor take turns, Connor holding Drake as Josh fucks him, before Connor bends Drake over and smacks him on the ass, popping his cork all over Drake's ass as Drake sucks Josh off and swallows his load. And if this is how the weekend starts...Enjoy!
title: Alumni Weekend
